ExecutiveSummary.one_line: LLM inference cost control protocol preserving QoS/SLOs with clear gates.

bullets.item: Tiered routing and caching with token budget enforcement.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Token budget policies and cache hit SLOs per route.
Cost per request caps aligned to business SLAs.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Rollback on QoS regression or budget breach.
